alert.note: Alert for Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL RIO ARRIBA AND EAST CENTRAL SAN JUAN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of El Huerfano Trading Post, or 21 miles south of Bloomfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nageezi, Blanco Trading Post and El Huerfano Trading Post. This includes Highway 550 between Mile Markers 108 and 112, and between Mile Markers 114 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.
